properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Uvipokee, uvipokee
(Bwana)
vipaji, vipaji vyetu.
Bwana Mungu
uvipokee. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Uvipokee Bwana,
vipaji vyetu Bwana,
Bwana Mungu
uvipokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Uipokee Bwana,
sadaka yetu Bwana,
Bwana Mungu
uipokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Uyapokee Bwana
mazao yetu Bwana,
Bwana Mungu
uyapokee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Utupokee Bwana
nasi watoaji Bwana
Bwana Mungu
utupokee.
